name: Bottle Blast
description:
Bottle blast is a game I made for a game jam. It is a top down shooter where you collect bottles to shoot at the trash bags. You have 100 seconds to collect the most points you can!

Instructions:

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move.

Use mouse to aim and and left click to shoot.

Collect Bottles for points and more ammo

If you touch an Enemy you will lose bottles and points!

Music By: GWriterStudio

The Music I found for the game doesn't quite fit but it makes you feel amazing when you are shooting up the trash bags.

***You my have to resize the window, I couldn't get a good default size***
